snippet.title: Pokemon Black 2 and White 2 - Animated Trailer
snippet.description:
N is back and fully animated in this epic promotional trailer for Pokemon Black 2 and White 2.

Head over to IGN for more Pokemon:
http://www.ign.com/games/pokemon-black-version-2/nds-129224

Subscribe to IGN's channel for reviews, news, and all things gaming: http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=ignentertainment
